Package org.jlab.mya.stream

Class WrappedStream<T extends Event,E extends Event>

java.lang.Object
org.jlab.mya.stream.EventStream<T>
org.jlab.mya.stream.WrappedStream<T,E>
Type Parameters:
T - The Outer Event Type
E - The Inner (Wrapped) Event Type
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable, Channel
Direct Known Subclasses:
BoundaryAwareStream, FloatAnalysisStream, FloatGraphicalSampleStream, FloatSimpleSampleStream, LabeledEnumStream
public abstract class WrappedStream<T extends Event,E extends Event> extends EventStream<T>
An EventStream that wraps another EventStream. The Event Type may be different between the outer and inner streams.
